Skill Notes:

Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 8 from any)
Ruffian: Skill Trained (Intimidation)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Alchemical Crafting: Can use Crafting to create alchemical items
Alchemical Crafting: Knows the formulas for 4 common 1st-level alchemical items
Communal Crafting: Can reduce the cost of crafting items by giving or receiving assistance
Craft Anything: Can craft items without meeting secondary requirements
Impeccable Crafting: Successes on Specialty Crafting are critical successes
Inventor: Can use Crafting to create unknown common formulas
Magical Crafting: Can craft magic items/Knows the formulas for 4 common magic items of 2nd level or lower
Quick Repair: Can Repair an item in 1 min
Specialty Crafting: +1 Crafting on selected type of item
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Never off-balance during Balance/Can use Acrobatics to Grab an Edge
Combat
Hit Points: 35 Armor Class: 17 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Rogue: 5 (%1; %2)
Armor: None Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Falchion (+6 1d10+1 S; strength; trained); Glaive (+6 1d8+1 S [Crit +d8]; strength; trained); Shield Boss (+6 1d6+1 B; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Ruffian: Defense Trained (Medium Armor)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Dwarven Waraxe as one category simpler
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of equal or lower level
Mobility: Can Stride at half Speed without triggering Reactions
Ruffian: Can use any weapon, other than simple or martial weapons that deal greater than d8 or d6 damage, to sneak attack/Critical hits with these weapons on an off-guard foe inflict their critical specialization effect
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or ranged weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts off-guard on creatures that haven't acted
Underhanded Assault: (2) Makes a melee Strike after a successful -2 Stealth vs. a foe that is adjacent to an ally
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Notes
Validation Errors:
Craft Anything Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15 and crafting rank (currently 2) >= 4
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 5 available vs. 9 allocated
Impeccable Crafting Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7, crafting rank (currently 2) >= 3 and specialty crafting feature (currently 1)
